title: Laboratory Maintenance Schedule
content: Please be informed that the CS/IT Laboratory will undergo maintenance on January 20, 2024 from 6:00 PM to 8:00 PM. All classes scheduled during this time will be rescheduled. Please coordinate with your respective faculty members for the new schedule.

title: New Software Installation
content:
We are pleased to announce that new software packages have been installed in the laboratory computers:

- Visual Studio Code
- IntelliJ IDEA
- MySQL Workbench
- Postman

These tools are now available for use in all laboratory sessions.

title: Laboratory Rules Reminder
content:
Dear Faculty and Students,

Please be reminded of the following laboratory rules:

1. No food or drinks inside the laboratory
2. Always log out after using the computers
3. Report any technical issues immediately
4. Keep the laboratory clean and organized

Thank you for your cooperation.
